../                      Parent directory
!INDEX.html              Long index format
biff+comsat-0.10.tar.gz  mail-notification daemon and enable/disable cmd (formerly part of netkit)
coolmail-1.3+maildir.patch.gz enhancement patch for coolmail
coolmail-1.3.tgz         biff replacement with 3d animation
kbiff-1.0.2.tar.gz       "xbiff"-like mail notification utility
korn-0.3.tar.gz          multiple-mailbox mail notification program using KDE
mailleds-0.93.tar.gz     blink your keyboard LEDs when there is new mail
newmail3.0.tar.gz        incoming mail notifier which can use Sox `play' command
xiobiff.tar.gz           X biff program for systems with SLIP/PPP connection, displays outgoing queue status
xlassie-1.3.tar.gz       enhanced biff with POP3 capabilities, message-count reporting, smaller footprint
xmailbox-2.5-bin.tar.gz  X new-mail notifier that can use sounds and animation [bin]
xmailbox-2.5-src.tar.gz  X new-mail notifier that can use sounds and animation [src]
xmailtool-4-linux.tgz    mail program under X (standard widgets)
